resources.string: You can activate periodic reminder notifications. Even if the application is closed, a request will be sent to the rest API in the background and the data received from the remote server will be displayed as a notification.
WorkManager is used for this feature.
Current dog count %s. This data is taken from remote server.
Current cat count %s. This data is taken from remote server.
Current bird count %s. This data is taken from remote server.
